product_name: The North Face Warm Crew Neck Long Underwear Top - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: When it's cold and you're ready for snowboarding, skiing, or snowshoeing, let the midweight performance fabric of The North Face Warm Crew Neck long underwear top for men keep you comfortable. Midweight moisture-wicking polyester and polyolefin fabric features FlashDry(TM) microparticles embedded in the fabric to dramatically improve dry time and breathability. Made of crushed coconut husks and crushed volcanic rock, the FlashDry fabric additive leads to faster dry times and will not wash out. You'll move without restriction thanks to the stretchy fabric and flat seams, which are designed to enhance motion. The North Face Warm crew neck top for men offers a relaxed fit that skims the body. Closeout.
